title: Seriously Riot?
body:
This was a RANKED game.

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/108616438/33377766

Three afk in a ranked game, I have a recording if anybody doesnt believe me. We didn't even get a loss prevention.

replies.body: BUT HERES COSMIC REAVER KASSADIN FOR ONLY 6969RP HES CHEAPER ON OCE NO HES NOT FREE BUT IF YOU BUY THE CHROMA PACKS YOU GET GREAT VALUE AND GREAT NEW COLOURS EVERYWHERE SO GIVE US ALL YOUR PARENTS MONEY
Well Ekko took poachers knife as well, never a good idea

It's not Riot's fault that there are Summoners out there trolling, Riot can only deal with these Toxic/Trolling Summoners if they get reported.
So please don't blame Riot for these trolls.
Just an FYI loss prevention would need to be turned on before your match started. So if there was a server issue they would have to know before your match started for you to get loss prevented.
I afk'd in a ranked because it wouldn't connect, my internet was fine.
Yeah I just had a similar problem with 4 in the game afk....  lucky won though but it was 2 on either team... not sure what is going on tbh

Was the game you played tonight too?

I'm fucking furious here. It's taken me so long to get into those promos to then be shut down by something that I cant even control
